channel.title: phplondon on Professional Blog
channel.description: Recent content in phplondon on Professional Blog

item.title: Contributing to open source can be easy
item.description: Although I’m busy day to day at my current contract *, that isn’t to say that my passions outside the office have come to a complete stop. I’m still going to regular meetups (like the PHP London Meetup and Docker London), and I’m also planning to go to Symfony Live London 2014. I’ve also been reading about, and trying some software, and making the odd fix and new code for myself.
